title: $10500-1/2Jade Signature on Sunny Isles Beach-Indulge In Luxury Living

posting_body: ['One Bedroom units starting at $8000/mo with almost 1400 SF.', 'Amenities Include:', 'Health and wellness center with sauna and steam room.', 'Coed hammam/Turkish bath.', 'Invigorating
